entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Oxtongue Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:52 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 04:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -13.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -16.0°C
Wind: ENE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
